description:
Crime Theft Wars – Online Open World Sandbox

 

The best 3D Open World Sandbox game, explore the city, drive, and more. Crime Theft Wars is an Online Open World Sandbox game, a first-person simulator. It’s a completely free roam sandbox game, which means that you can fully explore a big city, take on activities, hang out with friends, collect guns, complete missions, take jobs, work as a taxi driver, and more.

 

!EARLY ACCESS!

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates.

 

HANG OUT WITH FRIENDS ONLINE (COMING SOON)

You can play offline single-player, or you can hang out with your friends online. You can take on activities with your friends, explore the city together, complete missions, and more! Up to 8 multiplayer modes.

 

FIRST-PERSON OPEN-WORLD SANDBOX

To fully simulate real life, the game is in first-person FPV mode. Immerse yourself in this big city full of activities. You can explore different parts of the city, you even have a personal home that you can expand and customize. Take on quests from random people, hang out with your friends, explore and discover easter eggs and memes.

 

DRIVE CARS, FLY PLANES, HOVERBOARDS, AND MORE

If you are a car enthusiast then you will love driving in this game! You can drive anything, from vehicles to motorbikes, to planes and even special vehicles like hoverboards! You can buy your own car, store it in your garage and customize it as you wish. Make your car unique!

Furthermore, you can take on races, stunts, time-lapses, and more!

 

MINI-GAMES AND ACTIVITIES

This is a sandbox, the best open-world sandbox game! You can do anything, like playing arcade mini-games, to take jobs like taxi driver and pizza delivery boy. Just explore the city, talk to the NPC and accept quests, jobs, and missions. 

 

CUSTOMIZE HOMES, CARS, WEAPONS, GUNS… EVERYTHING! (COMING SOON)

You buy and own everything, and you can customize everything! 

Do you want to buy a gun? Yes, you can do it! 

Do you want to buy a car? Sure, why not!

You want to buy a mansion?! Absolutely yes!!

And the best thing is… you can buy and also customize everything!

 

GAME FEATURES:

  • Big 3D open-world sandbox game. You can fully explore the world.
  • Different mini-games and activities: missions, jobs, arcade games you name it! You will never get bored, there is so much to do in this game!
  • Lots of customizations: you can customize everything!
  • Optimized for mobile phones: this game runs smoothly on mobile phones, it’s been specially optimized to run smoothly even on old devices.
  • Own houses, guns, cars, and more: You can buy everything in this game, you just need to find the right dealer!
  • Huge map: a big map for a big game. Explore this huge map, explore, survive, shoot, defeat your enemies and win!
  • Constantly new updates: stay up to date on the latest news. This game is constantly updated, follow us on our social channels to stay updated on the latest news.
  • High-quality gameplay: you will have a ton of fun, the controls are easy to understand and highly customizable
  • Stunning 3d high-quality graphic. The PC’s graphic... On a mobile phone device!

 

Play offline and online with your friend in this awesome open-world sandbox game! Take on activities with your friends, explore the city together, complete missions, and more! Up to 8 multiplayer modes.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

This is an APK file, you will need to enable security settings. Here is how to install the game on your android device:

  1. Download the APK.
  2. Navigate to your phone settings menu then to the security settings. Enable the "Install from Unknown Sources" option.
  3. Use a file browser and navigate to your download folder. Tap the APK to begin the installation process.
  4. The app should safely install.
